answerText: cowpox[10] This disease is caused by bacteria in the genus Borelia, most commonly B. burgdorferi in North America. Victims may present neurological symptoms, such as Bell's palsy.
heading: DEES |2014 | Editors 2 | 11 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Name some zoonotic diseases, or diseases that are transferred from animals to humans,  [10] A vaccine for smallpox was developed by Edward Jenner from this other zoonotic disease, which can spread upon physical contact with cattle.
